faqs.question: What is the best sports betting app?
faqs.answerGuidance: Lead with FanDuel as #1 choice, mention BetMGM and Bet365 as close alternatives. Brief explanation of why FanDuel leads (App Store ratings, user interface, features). Mention that the best app varies by state availability and user preferences.

faqs.question: Are sports betting apps legal?
faqs.answerGuidance: Explain state-by-state legality. Licensed apps from FanDuel, BetMGM, etc. are legal in 30+ states. Must be 21+ (18+ in MT, NH, RI, WY, DC). Link to state availability section. Warn against offshore apps.

faqs.question: What are offshore sports betting apps?
faqs.answerGuidance: Define offshore apps as unlicensed operators based outside US. Explain risks: no regulatory protection, withdrawal issues, legal gray area. Strongly recommend using licensed US apps instead. Mention consumer protection benefits of licensed operators.

faqs.question: Are there free sports betting apps?
faqs.answerGuidance: Clarify that all major betting apps are free to download (App Store/Google Play). Explain that 'free' means no download cost, but real money wagering required. Mention no-deposit bonuses as way to try apps risk-free. Distinguish from daily fantasy/pick'em apps.

faqs.question: Which app has the best NFL betting?
faqs.answerGuidance: Recommend FanDuel and DraftKings for NFL. Highlight specific NFL features: same-game parlays, player props, live betting. Mention NFL-specific promos during season. Brief comparison of NFL market depth across top apps.

faqs.question: Which app has the best NBA betting?
faqs.answerGuidance: Recommend BetMGM and Bet365 for NBA betting. Highlight live betting features during games, player prop variety, same-game parlays. Mention apps with best NBA odds and in-play markets. Reference streaming availability where applicable.

faqs.question: Which sports betting app has the best promos?
faqs.answerGuidance: Compare current welcome bonuses: FanDuel (bet $5 get $150), BetMGM ($1,000 first bet), etc. Mention app-exclusive promos and daily boosts. Note that bonus values change seasonally. Link to bonuses section and detailed terms.

faqs.question: How do I download a sports betting app?
faqs.keyword: sports betting apps for iphone, sports betting apps for android
faqs.answerGuidance: Step-by-step for both platforms. iOS: App Store search, download, verify location. Android: Google Play or direct APK from brand site (explain why direct download sometimes needed). Mention age/location verification requirements. Link to detailed download guide section.

faqs.question: What's the difference between iOS and Android betting apps?
faqs.answerGuidance: Explain that features are nearly identical on both platforms. Note iOS apps sometimes get updates faster. Android users may need direct APK downloads in some states. Mention slight UI differences but same functionality. Recommend choosing based on device, not app differences.

faqs.question: Are mobile betting apps better than desktop sites?
faqs.answerGuidance: Highlight app advantages: convenience, location-based features, push notifications for bet results, faster access. Note desktop advantages: larger screens for research, easier multi-tasking. Recommend using both depending on situation. Mention that most bettors prefer mobile for live betting.
